title: Best of The Herd: 02/28/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/28/2019
description:
Colin warns people not to think Kyler Murray is like Russell Wilson after his measurements at the combine.  He reacts to the Jason Witten news and thinks it’s another sign that the Cowboys are a well-run organization.  Plus, Super Bowl Champion and 49ers GM John Lynch talks about his plans with the 2nd overall pick and why even though he doesn't need a QB he loves watching Kyler Murray.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
